parameters.name: minValue
parameters.description: Minumum value. Allowed format: number+% or  number+currency. Should have the same format as the maxValue if this last is not empty.

parameters.name: maxValue
parameters.description: Maximum value. Allowed format: number+% or  number+currency. Should have the same format as the minValue if this last is not empty.

parameters.description: Customer have deleted the coupon or not. By default this is set to false
